Class IOFunctions.PatternFilenameFilter

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Enclosing class:
    IOFunctions

    public static class IOFunctions.PatternFilenameFilter
extends de.esoco.lib.expression.predicate.AbstractPredicate<java.io.File>
implements java.io.FilenameFilter
    Implementation of FilenameFilter that uses a regular expression pattern for the filename selection. Also implements the Predicate interface for File input values.
